traits.name: Keen Scent
traits.desc: The giant sloth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks based on scent.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant sloth makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
